title: Conjuration Spells
content:
Strike

Vines sprout from the ground, slowing creatures within and possibly Entangling them.18m 2m DEX Save Concentration

Find Familiar: Cat

Find Familiar: Crab

Find Familiar: Frog

Find Familiar: Imp

Summon a familiar with the form and statistics of an imp. Its barbed tail can inject enemies with a potent poison.18m

Find Familiar: Quasit

Summon a familiar with the form and statistics of a quasit that can frighten enemies.18m

Find Familiar: Rat

Find Familiar: Raven

Find Familiar: Spider
